description: This jam-colored truck is divvying out grilled gourmet peanut butter & jelly sandwiches on the streets of Denver!Their oooey gooey menu consists of a tasty array of savory, sweet, and spicy sandwiches. They mill their own nut butters with peanuts, almonds, pecans, and cashews.  They make their own jams and preserves --like their tangy wild blueberry jam or spiced date preserves.  Come out to Hey PB & J for food that’s “Grilled. Gourmet. Great!”
name: Hey PB&J;
